channel.title: cloudflare on Ed Rousseau
channel.description: Recent content in cloudflare on Ed Rousseau

item.title: This site
item.description: Introduction So, you want to start your own blog. You could use an existing service, such as Wordpress (the service, not the software) or Medium. I have to admit that I don’t know much about the ups and downs of such services, because I decided straight off the bat to take a more DIY approach. I wanted to write my posts in a code editor instead of a WYSIWYG editor, I wanted the site to be simple & fast & reliable, and I wanted it to be free or close to it.
